title: Ijaz Shah expresses deep sorrow over death of Umer Sharif
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 3 (APP): Federal Minister for Narcotics Control Syed  Ijaz Ahmed Shah has expressed deep sorrow over the demise of legendary comedian and actor Umer Sharif.
In a condolence message, he said, legendary actor would be remembered forever.
He also prayed to Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in peace and grant courage to the bereaved family.
